ðŸ“– Summary: The tlosint-vm repository provides a pre-built Kali Linux virtual machine distribution tailored for OSINT (Open Source Intelligence) tasks, based on the Kali VM build scripts. It also offers a standalone script to customize Kali or Debian-based systems with a curated set of OSINT tools and Firefox hardening.
